# Insurance Policy Document

## Section 1: Definitions

### 1.1 Force Majeure
Force Majeure means any event beyond reasonable control including but not limited to natural disasters, war, strikes, or government actions.

### 1.2 Premium
Premium means the amount payable by the insured party for coverage under this policy.

### 1.3 Beneficiary
Beneficiary means any person designated to receive benefits under this policy.

## Section 2: Coverage

### 2.1 Property Damage
This policy covers direct physical loss or damage to covered property caused by a covered peril.

### 2.2 Liability Coverage
The insurer will pay damages for which the insured becomes legally obligated.

## Section 3: Exclusions

### 3.1 General Exclusions
The following are excluded from coverage:
- War and military action
- Nuclear events
- Intentional acts by the insured
- Wear and tear

## Section 4: Claims Process

### 4.1 Filing a Claim
To file a claim, contact our claims department within 30 days of the incident.

### 4.2 Documentation Required
Submit photos, police reports, and estimates for repairs.
